wikipedia_page.main: FitzRoy John Somerset, 5th Baron Raglan (6 November 1927 – 24 January 2010) was a British peer, the son of FitzRoy Richard Somerset, 4th Baron Raglan and the Hon. Julia Hamilton. He married Alice Baily, daughter of Peter Baily, in 1973. He and Alice were divorced in 1981. They had no children.

response: The Cefn Tilla estate passed by descent through the Raglan family, until the death of FitzRoy Somerset, 5th Baron Raglan in 2010. He bequeathed the court, its estate, and its major contents to his nephew Henry van Moyland of Los Angeles, while the title passed to the 5th Baron's younger brother Geoffrey. This led to a legal dispute between family members, at the conclusion of which the Raglan collection of military memorabilia, and many of the contents of the house, were sold at auction. In 2015, the house itself was sold. The court is a private residence, but is available for hire as a wedding venue.
